attributes.action: legislate for & pursue as a matter of urgency the DEVELOPMENT & INTRODUCTION of modern low carbon emission COAL BURNING STEAM LOCOMOTIVES to replace the diesel - diesel/electric ones currently in use on our railways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introducing modern steam engines would significantly reduce our dependance on costly imported oil, get rid of the pollution from diesel locomotives, rejuvenate our coal & mechanical engineering industry, provide new interesting jobs for our young men, and act as a huge tourist attraction.
